caption.p: Methanol extract of A. serotinum stimulated apoptosis in NCCIT cells. Apoptosis cells were evaluated using flow cytometry following annexin V-PE and 7-AAD staining in non-treated control cells (a) and plant extract-treated cells (b). Cells in the lower left quadrant are viable, those in the lower right quadrant are early apoptotic and those in the upper right and left quadrant are late apoptotic and necrotic
